message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you get a nice chunk too.
I'll take a smaller share now, but I'm expecting a better deal in the future.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a larger share to make it worth my while. Let's find a middle ground.
I'm starting to think you're not serious about finding a middle ground. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not getting taken advantage of.
I'm not trying to take advantage of you, Bob. This is the most I can offer while still getting a fair deal. Let's come to an agreement.
I'm not budging. We'll meet in the middle and call it a day.
